name: monolith-direct-porting
description: Direct porting modules that edit Rust code immediately (no mapping tables or planning artifacts).

modules.description: Port monolith/core hyperparams + base layer/task params into monolith-core with parity tests.
Port monolith/core feature + model registry surface into monolith-core with parity tests.
Port core embedding/layer utilities into monolith-core/monolith-layers with parity tests.
Port monolith/agent_service data definitions and constants into monolith-serving with parity tests.
Port monolith/agent_service backends/resource_utils into monolith-serving with parity tests.
Port zk_mirror + mocked_zkclient behavior into monolith-serving with parity tests.
Port TFServing client/monitor/wrapper + mocks into monolith-serving with parity tests.
Port replica/model manager logic into monolith-serving with parity tests.
Port agent_service CLI/controller/service behavior into monolith-cli/monolith-serving with parity tests.
Port native_training entrypoints and training loops into monolith-training with parity tests.
Port native_training service discovery and env helpers into monolith-training with parity tests.
Port core utilities, optimizers, and host-call helpers into monolith-core with parity tests.
Port top-level runners/utils and workspace config into monolith-cli/build tooling.
Port native_training data pipeline into monolith-data with parity tests.
Port native_training distributed runtime into monolith-training with parity tests.
Port native_training export/checkpoint paths into monolith-checkpoint with parity tests.
Port native_training layers/optimizers/hooks/metrics into Rust crates with parity tests.
Port native_training feature/hash ops into monolith-training with parity tests.
Entrypoint orchestrator for direct porting modules.
